Articles.Content:
They blow WOMD's in their home planet! They poison the air and water! They destroy weaker races without mercy! They nailed their own god to a stick! And they expand like crazy! They are undoubtfully the most bigoted, ambitious, and advanced vermin ever created by the Universe!

When the Vukkas destroyed a SINGLE human convoy, fifty Terran geo-syncs later, the entire Vukkan Homeworld was torn apart by anti-matter bombs! What is this? This is not vengeance! It's Genocide!

Their race spreads with peaceful intentions, but we can see their true reasons! For as they expand, they all give one united cry!

GENOCIDE! STRIP MINING! GENOCIDE! STRIP MINING!

We must stop this race from expanding further....wait...what? They blew up our home system? After we relocated? Already? Darn.....

Just a rant....
I imagine this rant sounded something like...
